flawed_nl_solution:
They scored an average of 720/24=<<720/24=30>>30 points in their previous games
Half that many would be 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 points
So in the finals, they scored 15-2=<<15-2=18>>18 points
Their opponent thus scored 18-2=<<18-2=16>>16 points
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
